scripts.deploy: npm run build && if not exist ../backend/public mkdir ../backend/public && if not exist ../backend/public/assets mkdir ../backend/public/assets && rmdir /s /q "../backend/public/assets" && mkdir "../backend/public/assets" && xcopy "dist\assets" "../backend/public/assets" /E /I /Y && copy "dist\index.html" "../backend/public/index.html" /Y
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run deploy && cd ../backend && php artisan serve
